programme.title: Margaret Thatcher's re-election and the 'special relationship', 1983
programme.short_synopsis: An American perspective on the re-election of Margaret Thatcher.
programme.medium_synopsis: Margaret Thatcher's dedication to the 'special relationship' between Britain and America, and journalist James "Scotty" Reston's correct prediction on Thatcher's re-election.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
